title: Recurrent point mutations in the kinetochore gene KNSTRN in cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma

tldr.text: The discovery of recurrent mutations concentrated at an ultraviolet signature hotspot in KNSTRN, which encodes a kinetochore protein, in 19% of cutaneous squamous cell carcinomas suggests a role for KNSTRn mutagenesis in SCC development.
